en.welcome: Hello! I'm Josephine, your voice note transcription assistant. Send me a voice note, and I'll transcribe it for you!

en.fileTooBig: Sorry, the message is too long for Josephine to process.

en.rateLimited: Our service is experiencing high demand. Please try again in a few minutes.
en.apiError: Sorry, there's a temporary issue with our service. Our team has been notified.
en.needCredits:
Oops! Your free transcriptions have now been used up. To unlock 50 more transcriptions, just send ¬£2 to [payment details]. Quick and easy! I'll be right here ready to continue helping with your voice notes as soon as you do. Thanks for letting me help.
Josephine.
